problems.title: Fibonacci Number (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given N, compute the N-th Fibonacci number using recursion. Assume F(0) = 0, F(1) = 1.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print F(N).
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
5

Sample Input
7

Sample Output
13
hintsList: Base cases: if n == 0 return 0, if n == 1 return 1. Recursive case: fib(n-1) + fib(n-2).
